ad_text: Searcy Farmers Association Sponsored Very Competitive Pay!!!!!!!!! plus benefits Looking for a class a or b cdl driver that would be good at driving a bulk feed truck delivering to customers? We need someone at our Bald Knob plant. Hours of operation are Monday thru Friday 7:30-5ish Fall and Winter is our busier time with some overtime required. Responsibilities also include some climbing, sometimes helping mixing and delivering feed and fertilizer, keeping mill clean, and working with other employees and customers. Knowledge of commercial driving regulations and safe driving practices needed Must have a clean driving record Must maintain DOT medical card Mill is located in Bald Knob Apply in Person at our Searcy location at 507 E. Booth Rd. FULL-TIME · $17 - $20 / HOUR · SEARCY, ARKANSAS Class A or B CDL Bulk Feed Truck Driver Apply now
